title: "Linear Regression"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
library(readr)
house_pricing <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opencampus-sh/einfuehrung-in-data-science-und-ml/main/house_pricing_data/house_pricing_train.csv")
```



### Beispiel einer einfachen linearen Regression
```{r}
mod <- lm(price ~ sqft_lot15 + as.factor(condition), house_pricing)
summary(mod)

```



### Beispiel einer linearen Regression mit Regularisierung
```{r}
library(glmnet)
mod <- glmnet(as.matrix(house_pricing[c('sqft_lot15', 'condition')]), house_pricing$price)
mod

```
